Utterance: Jessica, eta ki? Korchhen? Thik achhe. Ami bujhte parchi apnar sampratik kichu somosya hoyeche ja apnake amader agencyte nie esheche. Apni je somporkhe amake bolte paren?
Achha, ami idanimg onek dushchintay bhugchi.
Udbeg?
Sokale jokhon kaj korar somoy hoy tokhon satyoi narobash hoye jay. Thik amar pete projapotir moto hridoy dhakka dey.
Sutrang, apni jokhon kaj'e jawa'r jonno prostut hochhen tokhon apni udbigno hon. Apni ki je karon hote paren janen?

Besh kichukshon age ami lakhyo je somobar sokale jokhon ami amar gari te jete karmasthale jete giyeche, ami trunk'e kichu jinis rakhechilam ebong ami ager gari durghotona'y kone kichu khati dekhechilam ebong thik kothao theke ami karmasthale gari chalate narbhas anubhav korte shuru kori.
Thik. Tai apni, apni kori'te giyechilen tai kichu khati apnake ekti durghotnar kotha mone koriye diyechhe. Hyan,

Ami ghot bochorer sheshe ekta durghotona'y porechhilam, ebong, apni janen, ami aghat paini. Ami je gari ti lokkho korechilam tar kono prokrito khati hoini. Ami shudhu amar boshar bisoye ageiyee giye chhilam ami jani, durghotnar por kono somosya hoini. Ebong ekhono hothat korei, ami ei gari durghotnar kotha bhabei bhabchi. Ebong ami jani na eta kotha theke asche.
Tara bolechhe gat bochorer sheshe dikhe prosthon hoyeche.
Hyan, umm
Tai prai ato mash age.
Eta thik. Hyan, sambhobot halo'win ba tar kachakachi.
Ebong jokhon apni kaj korte prostut hochhen tokhon lakshanguli udbigno hote shuru koreche?
Ami ato ek mash age bolbo, sambhobot chhoy shoptah.
Ebong tarpor theke apni kromogot seguli pachchen.
Roj sokale ami ghum theke uthi ami satyoi kaj korte jaway khu'b ghabre jai ebong apni janen, gari te uthe beriye chi ebong kono somoy kono somoy ami abar gari durghotnar kotha bhabe kome paro.
Udbeger karone kaj korte deri korechen?
Ami prai protidini deri kori.
Prai protidin. Tai ei hoyeche ei hoyeche apnar jonno ekta somosya hoyeche koyek bhinn upaye.
Hyan, ami emonki koyekbar phone korechi karon ami kebal pokkhoghatastro hoini.
Apni ki IE jinis komano'r chesta korechen jemon onyo gari ba onyo kichu boshano kore?

Hyan, ami ekadhik gari shoh ekti bari'te thaki. Tai ami ekdin amar ma'er gari chalanor chesta korechi ebong apni janen, amar o ekoi onubhuti ache. Ebong protomvabe ami bhebhechilam eti kebal amar gari karon ami gari'r pichone kichu khati lokkho korechi. Ami bag'e chhilam ebong ami ekdin trunk'er modhye diye jachchilam ebong ami dekhlam je koro ti aslei bhitore dhakka deoya hoyeche. Ami mone korini je kono prokrito khati hoyeche ebong ami gari'r pichoner khati lokkho korechi. Ebong ami chhilam, baa, apni janen, ami ei durghotnay gorotar ahoto hoini. Ebong tokhoni ami eti bhabte shuru kori je ami kivabe ei durghotna'ti kotha theke kharp hote pare. Sutrang, apni jiggasha korechen je ami bhinn kichu korechi kina. Ami amar ma'er gari chalanor chesta korechi. Ami amar baba'r gari chalanor chesta korechi, kintu mone hocche ei somosto udbeg nioye ami jeno konoguloi gari chalachhi.
Thik achhe, ebong apnar'o sharirik kosto hochche? Hyan. Apni jemon onubhob korchhen. Apni onubhob korchhen
Sharirikbhabe jokhon ami onek like kori, amar bok fuli jay, satyoi atonkito.
Athoba apni durghotona ba durghotona somporkhe kichu somporko somporkhe sopno dekhtechhen?
Na, satyoi na.
Jokhon aponi ghumachchen na tokhon ki apanar kokhono bindu ache? Jekhane aponi mone koren je aponi dhornor durghotona'r somoy phiriye nioar moto ghotona ghotiyechen ta jahok?
Na temon kichu na.
Durghotonar kotha mone ache?
Oh, hyn, ami eta besh bhalo mone ache. Ami ekta stop sign e apeksha korchilam ebong ami mone kori je ami pichoner lokti tara oboshoi monoyog deyni kintu tara amake shesh kore diyechhe.
Durghotonar jonno ke dayi bole aponi mone koren?
Sotti ei kau na. Mane, eta ekta durghotona chhilo. Prokrito khati hoini. Aponi janen, durghotona sob somoy ghote, shudhu ekta fender bender.
Tai jokhon theke aponi ei udveger lakshanguli lakhyo koren, tokhon theke apanar ki emon somoy hoyeche jekhane aponi khushi ebong itibachok manoshik obhijoyto chhilen.
Ami jokhon theke ei guli pete shuru korechi tokhon theke ami sotti jibon dorayi geci.
Aponi je somosto somoy niche chilen ba je mohurtogulite aponi chilen na shekhane dhara bahikbhabe niche chilen.
Ami aro niche ba niche bolte hobe.
Kintu khono khono apon
Ami sotti mone korte parchi na kono nishchit noy.
Udveg shuru hower por theke onno lokeder sathe apanar somporko kivabe poriborton holo?
Na, sotti na.
Aponi manush theke bichchhinno bhaben?
Bichchhinno hower moto bichchhinno hobe na. Hyn. Somporke hote chan na.
Manusher sathe songocho neyi?
Na, sotti nei.
Apanar ki bhirkti ba rag bisphoron'er anubhuti ba erokom kichu ache?
Kichui na.
Apanar mone hoy aponi aro beparoya acharon korchen?
Beparoya bolte ki bujh?

Aponi somporker khetre aro beshi suyog grohon koren ba onno kono kichur bishoye aponi socheton hon na jemon kichu jokhon amader obak kore, amra ekdhoroner chomokprod priyota pai. Jhap dao. Iha prokriti. Aponi je lakho koren? Protikriya paribartito? Uhu
Hyn, ekta eje hoyeche bisoygulo amake bhoy dekhano moto hoyeche phone'er ring bajano lok e dorjaye nok korche kuku'r gheu gheu kore ta amake prante ekta aghat korar moto.
Aro aponi mone koren je protikriyaguli ager cheye beshi keboli prokriti tomarakar protikriya chhilo.
Hyn, hyn, eti amar jonno kichhuta udvigno je cholche.
Manoyog dite shomossha?
Na
Thik ache, Australia. Focus thakar hoyeche
Je elakay bhalo.
Osusthokor ghum hole kemon hoy? Ghumiye para somossha ghumiye thaka?
Ghumate kon somossha nei, kintu ami sara rat proyo ghorir kachakachi jegechi.
Tai aponi ghumate jachhen thik ache, ghumiye porechen. Thik ache, kintu shudhu ghumiye thakte somossha hochhe. Ghum theke uthar somoy aponi ki nirdishto kichu vabchen?
Aslei hote shomoye kaj'e jawar kotha vabhar moto noi. Kintu na, kichu na, boro kichu na.
Kon drug ba alcohol byabohar?
Na.
Chikitsa somossha kemon?
Na
Udvig theke shuru hower pointguli ki kaborno emon hoyeche je aponi apanar nijer sharirer baire onubhuti onubhob korchen jekhane aponi apanar sharir theke alada hoye gechen?
Na.
Aponar charpashay ja ghotoche ta somporko ekto abastob anubhuti'r moto jokhon aponi poribesh theke songojo bichchhinno bhaben tokhon kemon hoy?
Na, temon kichu na.

Jessica, ami aponake ekhane ekjon counselor'er sathe dekha korte jacchi. Aponi je khola hoin, je kichu aponi korte chan. Hyn. Aar ami ki ghotochhe ta amake bolartar jonno ebong ei proshner uttor dewar jonno aponi somoy dewar proshongso kori. Eta shohayok hoyeche.
Amake dekhar jonno aponake dhonnyobad. Nischoy.
